subtitle: About BabyCenter
description: We give expert advice about pregnancy and babies
title: What is BabyCenter?
content:
BabyCenter is the world’s leading source of information about pregnancy and babies. Over 45 million parents all over the world use our websites.

We want to improve the health of pregnant women and new families globally. You can trust BabyCenter information because all our articles are written with experts who want to help you and your baby stay healthy. 

We believe that by helping a mom, we also help her children, her family, and her community. 

Enjoy being a BabyCenter parent.

Find out more about BabyCenter (you may need a data plan to access this site) 

Contact us …
